titleStmt.title: The signes or An essay concerning the assurance of Gods loue, and mans saluation gathered out of the holy Scriptures. By Nicholas Byfield, one of the preachers for the citty of Chester.
titleStmt.author: Byfield, Nicholas, 1579-1622.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Beale for Ionas Man,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
